languages.text: "Я ждала этого приказа". {n}Звуки вашего голоса еще висят в воздухе, а стальной носок магсапога Иокасты обращает колено старика в костяную пыль, шрапнелью рвущую дряхлое мясо.{/n}

"I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я ждала этого приказа". {n}Звуки вашего голоса еще висят в воздухе, а стальной носок магсапога Иокасты обращает колено старика в костяную пыль, шрапнелью рвущую дряхлое мясо.{/n}

"I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

languages.text: « Avec plaisir. » {n}Le son de votre voix reste comme suspendu dans les airs alors que la semelle d'acier de la botte magnétique de Sauerback s'abat sur le genou du vieillard, pulvérisant ses os en une multitude de petits fragments qui viennent déchiqueter sa chair décrépite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Avec plaisir. » {n}Le son de votre voix reste comme suspendu dans les airs alors que la semelle d'acier de la botte magnétique de Sauerback s'abat sur le genou du vieillard, pulvérisant ses os en une multitude de petits fragments qui viennent déchiqueter sa chair décrépite.{/n}

languages.text: «Estaba esperando este momento». {n}El sonido de tu voz aún resuena en el aire cuando la punta de acero de la bota magnética de Sauerback pulveriza la rodilla del hombre y los fragmentos de hueso atraviesan su carne decrépita como si fueran metralla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estaba esperando este momento». {n}El sonido de tu voz aún resuena en el aire cuando la punta de acero de la bota magnética de Sauerback pulveriza la rodilla del hombre y los fragmentos de hueso atraviesan su carne decrépita como si fueran metralla.{/n}

languages.text: “就等您发话呢。”{n}你话音刚落，苏尔贝克就一脚踹了过去。钢靴碾碎了他的膝盖，骨片仿佛弹片一样，刺穿了他衰老的躯体。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就等您发话呢。”{n}你话音刚落，苏尔贝克就一脚踹了过去。钢靴碾碎了他的膝盖，骨片仿佛弹片一样，刺穿了他衰老的躯体。{/n}

languages.text: 「この瞬間を待ち望んでいた」{n}ザウアーバックの磁力ブーツの鋼鉄のつま先が男の膝を粉砕し、骨片が榴散弾のように老衰した肉を切り裂いた。その瞬間、あなたの声が空中にこだまをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この瞬間を待ち望んでいた」{n}ザウアーバックの磁力ブーツの鋼鉄のつま先が男の膝を粉砕し、骨片が榴散弾のように老衰した肉を切り裂いた。その瞬間、あなたの声が空中にこだまをした。{/n}

languages.text: "Darauf habe ich gewartet." {n}Der Klang deiner Stimme hängt in der Luft, als der Stahl von Sauerbacks Magnetstiefel das Knie des Mannes pulverisiert und Knochensplitter sein verkümmertes Fleisch zerfetzen wie Schrapnelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Darauf habe ich gewartet." {n}Der Klang deiner Stimme hängt in der Luft, als der Stahl von Sauerbacks Magnetstiefel das Knie des Mannes pulverisiert und Knochensplitter sein verkümmertes Fleisch zerfetzen wie Schrapnelle.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de bunu bekliyordum." {n}Sesin havada asılı kalırken Sauerback'in manyetik çizmelerinin çelik ucu, adamın dizini tuzla buz ediyor ve kemik parçaları, dermansız etini âdeta şarapnel gibi yırtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I've been waiting for this." {n}The sound of your voice hangs in the air as the steel toe of Sauerback's mag-boot pulverises the man's knee and bone shards shred his decrepit flesh like shrapnel.{/n}
